name: Kiss and Breakup
description:
Kiss and Breakup is a game about learning to be a better partner. Each relationship is a lesson to be learned. You may not learn everytig about you’re partner, but that ok! If you love eac other enouf, you get through everythig! <3

Credits:

This game was made by a brother and two sisters.

SecretJuice: Coding and concept

WereWeasel: Art, design, and music

OceansGratitude: Writing and traits
